name: AudioToolbox
description: A complete audio toolkit for voice messages and audio attachments - download with instant format conversions (WAV, M4A/AAC), EQ presets, playback speed, basic and A/B looping, queue mode, batch and auto-download, and custom filenames.
author: Pharaoh2k
features: Download voice messages and audio attachments with multiple modes (direct, save-as, browser)
Instant format conversion to WAV (uncompressed) or M4A/AAC
Professional EQ presets (Bass Boost, Treble Boost, Voice Enhance, Bass Cut)
Basic loop mode for continuous playback
A/B loop mode for precise section repetition
Queue mode for automatic sequential playback
Batch download all cached audio from a channel
Inline controls (loop button and menu) on audio messages
Context menu integration for quick access
Discord theme integration for seamless UI
